vendor_name: Hotel Camiral at PGA Catalunya  OLD ACCOUNT DO NOT USE
title: Five-Star Luxury with Spain’s #1 Golf Course
description: Indulge in five-star luxury at Hotel Camiral near Barcelona, part of the prestigious ‘Leading Hotels of the World’ collection and the onsite hotel of the PGA Catalunya Resort. Take advantage of two exceptional golf courses - one voted the #1 course in Spain, a beach-club style outdoor swimming pool and artisanal dining under the Mediterranean sun. Your escape includes daily breakfasts, indulgent dining experiences, welcome drinks on arrival and more.
offer_address: Carretera N-II, Km. 701, 17455 Caldes de Malavella, Girona, Spain

title: Five-Star Girona Resort just One-Hour from Barcelona with Top-Rated Golf Course
description: Immerse yourself in five-star indulgence at Hotel Camiral at PGA Catalunya Golf and Wellness located just ten minutes from Girona on the Costa Brava Coast. Take a swing at either of the two world-class golf courses, unwind at the Wellness Spa or enjoy an intimate fine-dining experience under the Mediterranean sun at one of the many onsite eateries. Beyond the stunning resort, be sure to explore the region's many wonders, including Barcelona within an hour's drive.
location_description: Hotel Camiral at PGA Catalunya Golf and Wellness
offer_address: Carretera N-II, Km. 701, 17455 Caldes de Malavella, Girona, Spain

title: Five-Star Costa Brava Wine & Golf Retreat Just Two Hours From Barcelona
description: Escape to Spain's Costa Brava to embrace a new type of healthy hedonism at the five-star Hotel Peralada Wine Spa & Golf. Spend your days teeing off at the Peralada Golf Club, sipping on Spanish wines at the Perelada Winery, or indulging in a sensory journey at the Wine Spa, where treatments are inspired by the surrounding vineyards. Come evening, choose between five dining options, including the Michelin-starred Castell Peralada Restaurant, before returning to your warm and elegant accommodation for a tranquil night's sleep.
offer_address: Carrer de Rocabertí, S/N, 17491, Peralada, Girona, Spain
